member.name: M:Maxum.EDM.ImageProcessing.DocumentIsRecognized
member.summary: If you don't want a document to be validated then set the IsSirmProcess bit = 0 in the Common.Document table. Currently Invoices are not validated because they come from within the system and are accurately named.
